entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter and his friends spent most of their free time in the library with her, trying to get through all their extra work. Harry was looking up 'Dittany' in One Thousand Magical Herbs and Fungi.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron burst out one afternoon, throwing down his quill and looking longingly out of the library window. Ron said, 'Hagrid! What are you doing in the library?'

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid shuffled into view, hiding something behind his back. He looked very out of place in his moleskin overcoat.

entities.name: nicolas flamel
entities.description: Hagrid asked if they were still looking for Nicolas Flamel.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron spent most of their free time in the library together.
